ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens - Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Zoom Lens - 500mm f/8 Telephoto Lens - .43x Wide Angle Lens
2x Telephoto Lens - 4 Piece Macro Close Up Set - 3 Piece Filter Kit - 16 GB High Speed Memory Card - Memory Card Reader
Camera Backpack - Full Size Professional Tripod - HDMI Cable - M&S; ScreenCleen Sealed Wipes - 33 Street Exclusive Starter Kit
33 Street Camera 3 Year Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Zoom Lens + 500mm f/8 Telephoto Lens + Super Wide Angle Lens + 2x Telephoto Lens + Macro Lens Set + UV Filter, CPL Filter, FLD Filter Kit + 16 GIG Deluxe Accessory Kit
